item.title: House Speaker Mike Johnson says Trump is ‘not delighted that Elon did a 180’ after the pair spent four months working closely together
item.description: Donald Trump and Elon Musk have a complex history.

item.title: The Fed and Wall Street Are Both Trying to Figure Out the Labor Market
item.description: Mixed jobs data complicates the outlook for Fed rate cuts.

item.title: Breathe, Breathe, Exhale: How to Lower Your Stress and Improve Your Mood in Just 5 Minutes
item.description: Research shows a few minutes of cyclic breathing can reduce anxiety and make you feel more centered and focused.

item.title: Climate change and nature loss merit radical prioritization amid a sprawling sustainability agenda, say former CEOs
item.description: Corporate action should prioritize threats to climate and nature given the commercial and societal risks linked to them.

item.title: European Central Bank cuts rate to 2% amid struggling eurozone growth and stable inflation
item.description: The European Central Bank said inflation of 1.9% was now around target, dropping the previous language that it was merely "on track".
